tr.td: **ACS Bias Reference Images** Superbias images for subtracting bias structure.More...
**ACS Cosmic Ray Rejection Tables** Parameters for rejecting cosmic rays from CR-SPLIT images.More...
**ACS CCD Tables** Converts commanded properties to calibrated values for each CCD amplifier.More...
**ACS Distortion Correction Tables** Parameters for geometric distortion correction.More...
**SBC Linearity Table** Parameters for determining linearity in MAMA images.More...
**Residual Geometric Distortion Images** Correct geometric distortion residuals.More...
**ACS Bad Pixel Table** Flag "permanently" bad pixels in the data quality (DQ) arrays of ACS images.More...
**ACS Photometry Keyword Tables** Replaces calls to SYNPHOT for generating photometry keywords with pre-computed values.More...
**ACS MultiDrizzle Parameter Tables** Parameters for combining and cleaning associated datasets.More...
**ACS CCD Overscan Table** Describes CCD overscan regions used to measure bias level.More...
**ACS A-to-D Tables** Analog to Digital conversion information.More...
**ACS Flat Field Files** Pixel-to-pixel correction file containing small scale variations.More...
**ACS HRC Coronagraphic Spot Table** Position of the coronagraphic spot versus time.More...
**ACS HRC Coronagraphic Spot Flat Field Files** Vignetting patterns of the occulting spots.More...
**ACS Dark Files** Reference images for dark current subtraction, including hot pixel correction and flagging.More...
**HRC Earth Flat Reference Files** Flats for large, diffuse objects.More...
**Data Quality Flags** Flags used to identify bad and corrected pixels in the data quality arrays of all ACS data.More...
